title: We Will Rock You (Megan Thee Stallion Version)
lyrics:
[Chorus: Queen, 
Megan Thee Stallion
]
We will, we will rock you
Ah
We will, we will rock you
Ayy
[Verse 1: Megan Thee Stallion]
I don't see competition (No)
I don't let haters stop me
I do my big one every time because I know they watchin' (Yeah, yeah, I know they watchin')
I'm the one to beat (Beat)
Make 'em get on they feet (On they feet)
I'm the one that got your best fighter losin' sleep (Yeah, yeah, ayy)
Step one, they doubt, they sleepin' (Yeah)
Step two, I'm the one they bеlieve in
Step three, I donе got a few yards on 'em (Hm)
Step four, now they all playin' defense (Baow)
Step five, build my team up (Yeah)
Mud on your face, get cleaned up
Bring 'em out, I'm ready to eat
I'ma use what's left to pick my teeth (Ah)
[Chorus: Queen, 
Megan Thee Stallion
]
We will, we will rock you
Uh-huh, uh-huh, uh-huh
 (Sing it!)
We will, we will rock you
Hm, hm, ayy
 (Sing it!)

[Verse 2: Megan Thee Stallion]
Win, that's all that we do (Uh-huh)
Everybody's watchin' and they all came for you
Hard work, dedication, an understatement
We fill up arenas that'll rock the whole nation (Hm)
This what I do, baby, watch the way I grew, baby (Yeah)
Once you pick a side, just be careful how you move, baby (Ah)
I hear the cheers, see the tears, chase the dreams, not the fears (Yeah)
Fight the fight that make 'em talk about your victory for years (Ah)
[Chorus: Queen, 
Megan Thee Stallion
, 
Both
]
We will, we will rock you
 (
Hey, hey
)
Uh-huh, uh-huh, yeah, yeah, ah
 (Sing it!)
We will, we will rock you, rock you
 (
Ah, ah
)
We will, we will rock you
 (
Hey, hey
)
Uh-huh, uh-huh, yeah, yeah, ah
 (Sing it!)
We will, we will rock you
Ah, uh-huh
, 
rock you
, 
ah
